text: ovun venuven ehi (ovunge dharmaya vana tavratayehi) api mese niyama kara tibunemu: “panata pana, æsata æsa, nahayata nahaya, kanata kana, datata data vasayenda, tuvalavatada niyatavasayenma pali ganu labanu æta” yanuveni. ehet kavurun ho pali gænima (ksama kara), danamanayak vasayen athæra dæmuvahot eya ohuta (ohuge napuru kriyavanta) vandi vasayen vanu æta. kavurun allah pahala kala (dharma niyamayanta) anuva viniscaya nokaloda, ovun niyata vasayenma aparadhakaruvanya
